name: equvelv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))

stmt.origin: equsalvw(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
stmt.pretty: equsalvw(s0, s1, s0 = s2, s1 = s2)

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s1))
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s1))
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s2))

|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s2))

|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s0, s2)

comment: A biconditional form of ~ equvel with disjoint variable conditions and proved from Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 2-Jun-2011.) Reduce axiom usage. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 10-Apr-2021.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 12-Jul-2022.)
